meta.description:
Imagine we're managing a telecommunications network that spans 6 key points, from a primary data center (Point 0) to a major user hub (Point 5). These points are interconnected by data lines, each with a specific capacity for data transfer.

Here are the capacities of each data line, indicating the maximum amount of data (in Gigabytes per second) that can flow from one point to another:

- From Point 0 (Data Center): Can send data to Point 1 (14 GB/s), Point 2 (9 GB/s), Point 3 (8 GB/s), Point 4 (7 GB/s), and Point 5 (8 GB/s).
- From Point 1: Can send data to Point 0 (4 GB/s), Point 2 (9 GB/s), Point 3 (10 GB/s), and Point 5 (12 GB/s).
- From Point 2: Can send data to Point 0 (4 GB/s), Point 1 (12 GB/s), Point 3 (13 GB/s), Point 4 (20 GB/s), and Point 5 (16 GB/s).
- From Point 3: Can send data to Point 0 (10 GB/s), Point 1 (8 GB/s), Point 2 (12 GB/s), and Point 5 (18 GB/s).
- From Point 4: Can send data to Point 0 (3 GB/s), Point 1 (13 GB/s), Point 2 (11 GB/s), Point 3 (20 GB/s), and Point 5 (2 GB/s).
- From Point 5 (User Hub): Can send data back to Point 0 (17 GB/s), Point 1 (4 GB/s), Point 2 (8 GB/s), Point 3 (2 GB/s), and Point 4 (12 GB/s).

In this network, a capacity of "0" means there is no direct data line between those two points.

The objective is to find out the maximum amount of data that can be transferred from Point 0 (Data Center) to Point 5 (User Hub) per second, while making sure that the data transfer through each line does not exceed its capacity. What is the maximum amount of data that can be sent from the data center to the user hub per second in Gigabytes?

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of data lines between points in GB/s

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Data flow between points in GB/s

objective.name: max_flow
objective.expr: quicksum(flow['0'][j] for j in Points) - quicksum(flow[i]['0'] for i in Points)
objective.description: Maximize data flow from Point 0 to Point 5

constraints.name: capacity_0_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 0 to Point 1

constraints.name: capacity_0_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 0 to Point 2

constraints.name: capacity_0_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 0 to Point 3

constraints.name: capacity_0_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 0 to Point 4

constraints.name: capacity_0_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 0 to Point 5

constraints.name: capacity_1_0
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 1 to Point 0

constraints.name: capacity_1_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 1 to Point 2

constraints.name: capacity_1_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 1 to Point 3

constraints.name: capacity_1_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 1 to Point 5

constraints.name: capacity_2_0
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 2 to Point 0

constraints.name: capacity_2_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 2 to Point 1

constraints.name: capacity_2_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 2 to Point 3

constraints.name: capacity_2_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 2 to Point 4

constraints.name: capacity_2_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 2 to Point 5

constraints.name: capacity_3_0
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 3 to Point 0

constraints.name: capacity_3_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 3 to Point 1

constraints.name: capacity_3_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 3 to Point 2

constraints.name: capacity_3_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 3 to Point 5

constraints.name: capacity_4_0
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 4 to Point 0

constraints.name: capacity_4_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 4 to Point 1

constraints.name: capacity_4_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 4 to Point 2

constraints.name: capacity_4_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 4 to Point 3

constraints.name: capacity_4_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 4 to Point 5

constraints.name: capacity_5_0
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 5 to Point 0

constraints.name: capacity_5_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 5 to Point 1

constraints.name: capacity_5_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 5 to Point 2

constraints.name: capacity_5_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 5 to Point 3

constraints.name: capacity_5_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Point 5 to Point 4

constraints.name: flow_conservation_1
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['1'] for j in Points) + quicksum(flow[i]['1'] for i in Points)
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Point 1

constraints.name: flow_conservation_2
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['2'] for j in Points) + quicksum(flow[i]['2'] for i in Points)
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Point 2

constraints.name: flow_conservation_3
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['3'] for j in Points) + quicksum(flow[i]['3'] for i in Points)
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Point 3

constraints.name: flow_conservation_4
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['0']['4'] for j in Points) + quicksum(flow[i]['4'] for i in Points)
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Point 4
